params.name: callbacks
params.doc: The callbacks (URL) allowing the definition of the pages which should be redirected back to the original site during the flow initiated in Wix

messages.name: _wix_headless_v1_WixUrlCreatedDomainEvent
messages.displayName: Wix Url Created Domain Event Object

members.name: id
members.doc: Unique event ID.

members.name: entityFqdn
members.doc:
Expected `wix.headless.v1.wix_url`.
Fully Qualified Domain Name.

members.name: slug
members.doc:
Expected `created`.
Event name.

members.name: createdEvent
members.doc: Event Info

members.name: entityId
members.doc: WixUrl ID associated with this event.

members.name: eventTime
members.doc: Event timestamp.

members.name: triggeredByAnonymizeRequest
members.doc: Whether this event was triggered as a result of a privacy regulation application (e.g., GDPR).

members.name: originatedFrom
members.doc: If present, indicates the action that triggered the event.

messages.name: _wix_headless_v1_WixUrlEntityCreatedEvent
messages.displayName: Wix Url Entity Created Event Object

members.name: entity
members.doc: Event body

members.name: slot
members.doc:
The slot for the corresponding session, when the session is either a single session 
 or a specific session generated from a recurring session.

members.name: bookable
members.doc:
Whether the slot is bookable. Bookability is determined by checking a 
 session's open slots and booking policies. Locks are not taken into
 account.

members.name: totalSpots
members.doc:
Total number of spots for this slot.
 For example, if a session has a total of 10 spots and 3 spots are booked, 
 `spotsTotal` is 10 and `openSpots` is 7.

members.name: openSpots
members.doc: Number of open spots for this slot.

members.name: waitingList
members.doc: An object describing the slot's waitlist and its occupancy.

members.name: bookingPolicyViolations
members.doc: Booking policy violations for the slot.

members.name: locked
members.doc:
Indicates whether the slot is locked because a waitlist exists. 
When a slot frees up, the slot is offered to the next customer on the waitlist. Read-only.

members.name: sessionId
members.doc:
ID for the slot's corresponding session, when the session is either a single session 
 or a specific session generated from a recurring session.

members.name: serviceId
members.doc: Service ID.

members.name: scheduleId
members.doc: Schedule ID.

members.name: startDate
members.doc:
The start time of this slot in [RFC 3339](https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc3339)
 format.

 If `timezone` is specified,
 dates are based on the local date/time. This means that the timezone offset
 in the `start_date` is ignored.

members.name: endDate
members.doc:
The end time of this slot in
 [RFC 3339](https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc3339) format.

 If `timezone` is specified,
 dates are based on the local date/time. This means that the timezone offset
 in the `end_date` is ignored.

members.name: timezone
members.doc:
The timezone for which slot availability is to be calculated.

 Learn more about [handling Daylight Savings Time (DST) for local time zones](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-bookings/availability-calendar/query-availability#wix-bookings_availability-calendar_query-availability_handling-daylight-savings-time-dst-for-local-time-zones) 
 when calculating availability.

members.name: resource
members.doc:
The resource required for this slot. Currently, the only supported resource
 is the relevant staff member for the slot.

members.name: location
members.doc: Geographic location of the slot.

members.name: id
members.doc: Resource ID.

members.name: name
members.doc: Resource name. Read only.

members.name: id
members.doc:
Business location ID. Available only for locations that are business locations, 
 meaning the `location_type` is `"OWNER_BUSINESS"`.

members.name: name
members.doc: Location name.

members.name: formattedAddress
members.doc: The full address of this location.

members.name: locationType
members.doc:
Location type.
 
 - `"OWNER_BUSINESS"`: The business address, as set in the siteâ€™s general settings.
 - `"OWNER_CUSTOM"`: The address as set when creating the service.
 - `"CUSTOM"`: The address as set for the individual session.

members.name: totalSpots
members.doc:
Total number of spots and open spots for this waitlist.
 For example, a Yoga class with 10 waitlist spots and 3 registered 
 on the waitlist has 10 `total_spots` and 7 `open_spots`.

members.name: openSpots
members.doc: Number of open spots for this waitlist.

members.name: tooEarlyToBook
members.doc: Bookings policy violation. Too early to book this slot.

members.name: tooLateToBook
members.doc: Bookings policy violation. Too late to book this slot.

members.name: bookOnlineDisabled
members.doc: Bookings policy violation. Online booking is disabled for this slot.

docs.summary:
*
WixUrl is the main entity of WixUrlService that can be used for lorem ipsum dolor

members.name: fullUrl

members.doc: An external thank you page URL, used when the thank you page is implemented outside of Wix

members.doc: An external thank you page URL, used when the thank you page is implemented outside of Wix

members.name: loginUrl
members.doc: An external thank you page URL, used when the thank you page is implemented outside of Wix

members.doc: The selected calendar slots to checkout

members.name: timezone
members.doc: The timezone used for presentation and formatting when presenting the selected slot in a human readable format

members.name: serviceId
members.doc: The ID of the service used in order to select the slot

messages.displayName: Wix Url Ecom Checkout Params Object

members.name: checkoutId
members.doc: The ID of the checkout entity used in order to start the checkout with

members.name: planId
members.doc: The ID of the selected paid plan

members.name: navigateToSectionProps
members.doc: The encoded string representing the navigation defined for the end of the flow, probably received by

messages.name: _wix_headless_v1_WixUrlEventsCheckoutParams
messages.displayName: Wix Url Events Checkout Params Object

members.name: reservationId
members.doc: The ID of the selected event

members.name: eventSlug
members.doc: The slug of the selected event (url friendly name)

members.name: callbacks
members.doc: The callbacks (URL) allowing the definition of the pages which should be redirected back to the original site during the flow initiated in Wix

members.name: bookingsCheckout
members.doc: The parameters used in order to generate the URL into the Bookings checkout flow

members.name: ecomCheckout
members.doc: The parameters used in order to generate the URL into the Ecom checkout flow

members.name: eventsCheckout
members.doc: The parameters used in order to generate the URL into the events checkout flow

members.name: paidPlansCheckout
members.doc: The parameters used in order to generate the URL into the paid plans checkout flow

members.name: login
members.doc: The parameters used in order to generate the URL into the Wix login page

members.name: wixUrl
members.doc: The Wix URL details to redirect into

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • OWNER_BUSINESS
  • OWNER_CUSTOM
  • CUSTOM
